00025 #ifndef INCLUDE_git_zlib_h__
00026 #define INCLUDE_git_zlib_h__
00027 
00028 #include <zlib.h>
00029 
00030 /**
00031  * @file git2/zlib.h
00032  * @brief Git data compression routines
00033  * @defgroup git_zlib Git data compression routines
00034  * @ingroup Git
00035  * @{
00036  */
00037 GIT_BEGIN_DECL
00038 
00039 #if defined(NO_DEFLATE_BOUND) || ZLIB_VERNUM < 0x1200
00040 /**
00041  * deflateBound returns an upper bound on the compressed size.
00042  *
00043  * This is a stub function used when zlib does not supply the
00044  * deflateBound() implementation itself.
00045  *
00046  * @param stream the stream pointer.
00047  * @param s total length of the source data (in bytes).
00048  * @return maximum length of the compressed data.
00049  */
00050 GIT_INLINE(size_t) deflateBound(z_streamp stream, size_t s)
00051 {
00052         return (s + ((s + 7) >> 3) + ((s + 63) >> 6) + 11);
00053 }
00054 #endif
00055 
00056 /** @} */
00057 GIT_END_DECL
00058 #endif
